Module InventoryManagement
Package com.inventory.data.datamodel

Class Validator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inventory.data.datamodel.Validator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddModifyPartController, AddModifyProductController
    public class Validator
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which extends the functionality of other classes to include text validation for TextFields.

        public Validator()

    • Method Detail

      • isDoubleValid

        protected boolean isDoubleValid​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
        Checks for validity of an element expected to contain a double. Corrects any input that includes a non-number or Decimal "." then runs the overloaded isDouble which attempts to parse a double, and if it cannot parsed, throws an error.
        Parameters:
        event - The KeyEvent which calls the method.
        Returns:
        Returns the result of the Overloaded method isDoubleValid(), which will be true only if input is a valid double.

      • isDoubleValid

        protected boolean isDoubleValid​(javafx.scene.control.TextField element)
        An overloaded method which can be called as a standalone, when input correcting is not necessary, and the goal is only to check if input is valid or invalid. NOTE: this method checks if input is valid according to type, not format.
        Parameters:
        element - The TextField element containing the input to be checked
        Returns:
        Returns true if input is valid, and false if input is valid.

      • isIntegerValid

        protected boolean isIntegerValid​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
        Checks for validity of an element expected to contain a integer. Corrects any input that includes a non-number. then runs the overloaded isDouble which attempts to parse a int, and if it cannot parsed, throws an error.
        Parameters:
        event - The KeyEvent which calls the method.
        Returns:
        Returns the result of the Overloaded method isDoubleValid(), which will be true only if input is a valid int.

      • isIntegerValid

        protected boolean isIntegerValid​(javafx.scene.control.TextField element)
        An overloaded method which can be called as a standalone, when input correcting is not necessary, and the goal is only to check if input is valid or invalid. NOTE: this method checks if input is valid according to type, not format.
        Parameters:
        element - The TextField element containing the input to be checked
        Returns:
        Returns true if input is valid, and false if input is valid.

      • isCSVTextValid

        protected boolean isCSVTextValid​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)

      • isCSVTextValid

        protected boolean isCSVTextValid​(javafx.scene.control.TextField element)
        An overloaded method which can be called as a standalone, when input correcting is not necessary, and the goal is only to check if input is valid or invalid. Only checking whether or not an element is containing a comma (,) or a quotation mark (").
        Parameters:
        element - The TextField element containing the input to be checked
        Returns:
        Returns true if input is valid, and false if input is valid.
